chinese: 农民需要适应气候的变化。
english: The farmers need to adapt to the changes of the climate.

chinese: 大学合唱团的试音将在下周举行。
english: Auditions for the university choir will be held next week.

chinese: 蜂蜜可以用作食品和保健品。
english: Honey can be used as the food and health product.

chinese: 目前，经济增长是不可预测的。
english: Currently, the growth of the economy is unpredictable.

chinese: 心理学家说我们所经历的影响了我们的行为。
english: Psychologists say what we have experienced influences our behaviors.

chinese: 请把参考书放回书架上正确的位置。
english: Please return the reference book to the correct position on the shelf.

chinese: 财务学的学生有一项会计作业。
english: There is an accounting assignment for finance students.

chinese: 计算器让我们在不犯错的情况下添加数字。
english: Calculators allow us to add numbers without making mistakes.

chinese: 数码相机比传统胶片有一些优势。
english: The digital camera has some advantages over traditional film.

chinese: 曾经严重的许多疾病已经被根除。
english: Many diseases that were once serious have been eradicated.
